body_html: @drpngx I have figured it out. The non-deterministic part is the clip_by_value operation. By sending it to CPU and setting colocate_gradients_with_ops for the AdamOptimizer, the results between two different runs are the same. Do you have any idea why this is the case?

body: @drpngx I have figured it out. The non-deterministic part is the [clip_by_value ](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/clip_by_value) operation. By sending it to CPU and setting `colocate_gradients_with_ops `for the AdamOptimizer, the results between two different runs are the same. Do you have any idea why this is the case?
